$(document).ready(function() {
$("#login-school-list").change(function() { var action = $(this).val(); $("#district-login").attr("action", action); });
$('.br-login-submit').click(function () { $('.form-signin').submit(); $('.br-login-user').val(''); $('.br-login-pass').val(''); });
});

District
AWRSD COVID-19 Information
AWRSD COVID-19 Information
AWRSD COVID-19 Information
This website will serve as a repository of information regarding the district's response to the COVID-19 virus.Â This site is evolving as information and communication is gathered regarding this disease.
Â
Â - 4/21/2020: This afternoon the governor announced that all schools in Massachusetts will be closed until the end of the school year.Â Â
4/8/2020: The AWRSD Remote Learning Plan has been published and can be found at:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1I2uqW72VUn81Xs3ZheWrr6i0Kp8EuJFV/viewÂ
- 4/2/2020:Â Â There is a text notification system the state set up for all residents to receive text updates on important informationÂ put out by the state government.Â You can text COVIDMA to 777-888 to receive updates.Â
-3/17/2020: We realize that situations change, especially in the light of the business closures.Â To this end, Free and Reduced Applications can be turned in at any time.Â Â
Free and Reduced Application
Â
Â

type:'inline',
midClick: true
});
